title: Microsoft Delays Windows Copilot+ Recall Release Over Privacy Concerns
description: Microsoft is further delaying the release of its controversial Recall feature for Windows Copilot+ PCs, stating it's taking the time to improve the experience. The development was first reported by The Verge. The artificial intelligence-powered tool was initially slated for a preview release starting in October.
